    void predict​(int nextWay)
    what predict do: 1.calculate current Grid 2.calculate next Grid
    Message run()
    if direction is unchanged, keep moving until it reach a wall if direction is change and the next direction is opposite to the current one, turn around immediately if direction is change but not opposite, if next direction is not a wall, turn immediately, if it is a wall, wait until this direction is not a wall
    void walk​(int input)
    walk one pixel according to the current direction

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(App windowsFrame, int origX, int origY, long speed)
      Parameters:
      windowsFrame - Current window of the game
      origX - the starting position of the player
      origY - the starting position of the player
      speed - the speed of the player

  • Method Details

    • isOpposite

      public boolean isOpposite()
      Returns:
      current direction is opposite to previous direction

    • walk

      public void walk​(int input)
      walk one pixel according to the current direction

    • isWall

      public boolean isWall​(int nextX, int nextY)
      Parameters:
      nextX - x-axis of next possible grid
      nextY - y-axis of next possible grid
      Returns:
      if it is true, the next grid is a wall

    • predict

      public void predict​(int nextWay)
      what predict do: 1.calculate current Grid 2.calculate next Grid
      Parameters:
      nextWay -

    • run

      public Message run()
      if direction is unchanged, keep moving until it reach a wall if direction is change and the next direction is opposite to the current one, turn around immediately if direction is change but not opposite, if next direction is not a wall, turn immediately, if it is a wall, wait until this direction is not a wall
      Returns:
      next position player will goto
